extendedInfo.description: âOver 1 Million! downloads for Brainsss!ââOVER 50 million humans convertedâThe critically acclaimed breakthrough new game where YOU play as the zombie swarm, rounding up mankind to join your side. TouchArcade 4 Â½ out of 5 â's! iFanzine.com 4 Â½ out of 5 â's! "EPIC" - 148Apps.com "It's a beautifully implemented squad-based title" - iFanzine.com "Vibrant, loveable aesthetic" - gamezebo.com "Brainsss is not your typical zombie game, in fact it is far from that" - approc.com"Engaging mixture of strategy and tactile play" - gamezebo.com "If you're a fan of strategy games or zombies, give Brainsss a try" - appadvice.com Control multiple groups of zombies and guide them to victory with touch controls. Trap, chase, intimidate, and ultimately, convert those annoying humans.Build a massive swarm of zombies and trash the human defenses. Careful some of the humans will fight back! Unlock unique Hero zombies to powerup your zombie swarm with bonuses and special abilities as well as an EXCLUSIVE Droid hero for Android.Play through more than 70 amazing, beautiful levels that include suburbia, hospitals, parks, airports, cities, and offices, to name a few. Use your cunning, strategy, and on the fly decision making to catch them all! Newly added Casual mode allows for unique one touch play. Â» 20+ Unlockable Heroes Â» Unique action RTS gameplay Â» 2 game modes (Casual/Strategy) Â» Multiple Zoom levels though simple pinch interface Â» Left Handed support Â» Top-down view mode available for the RTS players Â» Group Save and Recall via the new Grouping toolbar Â» Game Speed can be set to 3 settings (Slower, Normal and Faster) Â» Improved and more responsive controls Â» Optimized levels for dramatically faster loading Â» Brainsss Bucks now appear as random drops from humans Â» Extensive new help system Â» 20+ Unlockable Comics Â» Improved Zombie A.I. Â» Crazy Golf Carts!!

reviews.title: Lovely!
reviews.comment: The game starts nice and easy but gets challenging quite fast. I especially enjoy the little sarcastic remarks the humans make! Not many games make me laugh like that :-)
reviews.author: Avigail Golani

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Fun to play, cool graphics, smooth gameplay
reviews.author: David D

reviews.title: Simple & cute
reviews.comment: Simple cute design, a brain-free time-waster. Easy to understand yet a bit challenging.
reviews.author: Rachel Walls

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love its fun funny and cool to play
reviews.author: Mia Rodgers

reviews.title: Overall great
reviews.comment: Enjoying playing this game... Annoyed by the same two text blurbs in the loading screen. You\'re obviously creative, so why skimp there? Also the two-finger drag only works temporarily. You\'re always slid back to focus on your crew. It\'d be nice if you could slidd and then do skme other gesture to go back... Otherwise, I\'m enjoying the casual gameplay. It\'just right.
reviews.author: Allan Dorr

reviews.title: A fun game
reviews.comment: A great one-finger game that plays easily. Fun to be on the zombie side stopping survivors getting to the rescue helicopter!
reviews.author: Lloyd Wakefield

reviews.title: Fun but needs to could get harder
reviews.comment: Fun game, definitely like the strategy better. Could get harder as it progresses. would nge nice to have a few more different areas to play in.
reviews.author: Lisa Hanssens

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Haven\'t gotten too far in but seems interesting enough for me to see where it goes
reviews.author: AJ Bino

reviews.title: More about the casual.
reviews.comment: Love the cartoon 3D animation and the light heartedness of it.  Wanna kill some time..get some Brainsss.
reviews.author: Nathan Vaughn

reviews.title: My all time favorite game!
reviews.comment: Such a fun game and i love the graphics! Totally free without super obnoxious ads:) 4 star rating because the game play could be a little smoother on my note 2. But I love the music I love the funny comics I love the graphics I love the remarks the humans make Its hours of fun!
reviews.author: Fadil Karim

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: Great game, really addicting. Always have to catch myself or else I drain my phone battery from playing it too much.
reviews.author: Mark Holley

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its a game u can play till your thumb bleeds
reviews.author: Jozef Siekierka

reviews.title: Slow but Fun
reviews.comment: Its a little slow for my liking. I like fast paced but intellectual games. Its fun regardless.
reviews.author: Emily Hogan

reviews.title: Super fun
reviews.comment: Haven\'t played in months and still easy to get back into.
reviews.author: Alex Reed

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: It is so fun and exciting to be able to be in my zombie fantasy to eat people and make them zombies
reviews.author: Jody Ernst

reviews.title: Best zombie apocalypse game on the market
reviews.comment: A truly addictive game it is well worth it and I love the mad scientist when he runs real fast :-)
reviews.author: Charlotte Cockcroft

reviews.title: Fun time waster
reviews.comment: Enjoyable play; keeps it interesting and gets steadily harder. Unfortunately, I can get it to update to play now. I\'m going to see if removing & installing resolves this.
reviews.author: James Lim

reviews.title: Great fun!
reviews.comment: One thing of the best games I\'ve played on android. A few minor complaints, but overall a fun time.
reviews.author: Eric Murillo

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really fun, well made, and a cool way to play. Love the stratagy mode
reviews.author: Zachary Pease

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great game. Addicting. But I have questions that I don\'t know where I can find help...
reviews.author: Katherine Mc Guire
